attributes.action: Commission a public enquiry into the SCIENCE of climate change before making any UK commitments at the Copenhagen Climate Conference.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Many acclaimed scientists maintain that there is no evidence to substantiate a link between anthropogenic carbon dioxide emissions and global temperature fluctuations. Furthermore, recent revelations regarding CRU, Giss, and Noaa email correspondence on the subject may indicate less than total transparency when processing data that is of vital scientific, and economic importance to the climate "debate". It would clearly be extremely foolhardy for any Government to enter into binding Global agreements about carbon reductions without having first publicised the scientific basis for its proposed actions, undergone open and uncensored debate, and received the assent of its electorate.
